DISCORD_TOKEN.description: The token for your Discord bot. Get this from the Discord Developer Portal.

GOOGLE_PROJECT_ID.description: Your Google Cloud Project ID we're deploying to - make sure to have the Vertex AI and Cloud Storage APIs enabled.

GOOGLE_PROJECT_LOCATION.description: The GCP region where your Vertex AI resources are located (probably us-central1).

CONFIG_ASSESSMENT_MODEL.description: The AI model used for quality assessment of potential bot responses.

CONFIG_ASSESSMENT_SCORE_THRESHOLD.description: The minimum score (1-100) a potential response must achieve in quality assessments to be sent.

CONFIG_ERROR_MODEL.description: The AI model used for generating user-friendly error messages.

CONFIG_ESSAY_MODEL.description: The AI model used for generating essays and long-form text content.

CONFIG_EVENTS_MODEL.description: The AI model used for generating responses to chat events and user messages.

CONFIG_INPUT_EVENT_LIMIT.description: The maximum number of past chat events to include in the context for the AI model.

CONFIG_INPUT_FILE_TOKEN_LIMIT.description: The maximum number of tokens to use for analyzing the content of input files (images, websites).

CONFIG_INPUT_FILE_AUDIO_COUNT_LIMIT.description: The maximum number of audio files to process in a single request.

CONFIG_INPUT_FILE_VIDEO_COUNT_LIMIT.description: The maximum number of video files to process in a single request.

CONFIG_MOVIE_MODEL.description: The AI model used for generating video content.

CONFIG_PHOTO_MODEL.description: The AI model used for generating images.

CONFIG_RATE_LIMIT_IMAGES.description: The maximum number of images Bott can generate per month.

CONFIG_RATE_LIMIT_MUSIC.description: The maximum number of songs Bott can generate per month.

CONFIG_RATE_LIMIT_VIDEOS.description: The maximum number of videos Bott can generate per month.

CONFIG_SONG_MODEL.description: The AI model used for generating music and audio content.

FILE_SYSTEM_ROOT.description: The root directory on the local file system for storing input and output files.

LOG_TOPICS.description: Controls which log topics to display. Comma-separated list of topics: debug, info, warn, error, perf.

PORT.description: The port of the health check server required for GCP Cloud Run.
